```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
chicken <- raster("/home/shares/food-systems/Food_footprint/stressor_summary/rescaled/cumulative_stress/broilers_cumulative_stress.tif")

chicken_df<--rasterToPoints(chicken) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(broiler_cum = abs(broilers_cumulative_stress)) 

```

```{r}
salmon<-raster("/home/shares/food-systems/Food_footprint/stressor_summary/rescaled/cumulative_stress/salmon_cumulative_stress.tif")

salmon_df<--rasterToPoints(salmon) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(salmon_cum = abs(salmon_cumulative_stress)) 
```

# Histograms

Chicken

```{r}

test1<- chicken_df %>% 
  filter(!broiler_cum == 0)

hist(test1$broiler_cum, breaks = 10)

```

Salmon

```{r}
test<- salmon_df %>% 
  filter(salmon_cum<0.00001)

hist(test$salmon_cum, breaks = 10)
```
